title: Cushion Cover, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: Rococo stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Cushion cover in an allover pattern of diamonds and rosettes, tassels on the edge. In red silk on linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cushion Cover, 16th–17th century.
16th–17th century. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: Rococo stitch embroidery on plain weave. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-101.
